name: Stolen Star (milkimoone, Reina Burkhalter, Dragonstar)
description:
Stolen Star is a cute Christmas themed game with a dark twist.
Sneak through a Christmas factory and discover it's dark secrets while playing a tiny spionage robot. Scan and spawn objects to build paths and solve puzzles to complete your mission of corporate espionage.

This game is a project which was created at the ZHdK within 2 Months and contains the very first part of Spiderbot's story and adventure.

Coding & Sound Design: 
Julian Maier
Art:  
Anja Irniger
Music:
Reina Burkhalter
